definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: It was not easy to work in the shed;in winter it was a veritable ice-box.
sentences.chinese: 在这木棚里工作可不轻松，冬天简直是个冰箱。

sentences.english: I searched every corner of your frig but these are all I found.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的冰箱都翻遍了，就找到这些。

sentences.english: Fungizone intravenous in powder form should be stored in the refrigerator, protected against exposure to light.
sentences.chinese: 两性霉素B粉剂应避光存于冰箱中。

sentences.english: In a corner of the room behind a screen was a small gas stove and a refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 在房间一个角落的屏风后有一个小煤气灶和一台冰箱。

sentences.english: Basil will lose its freshness and shape if you place it in the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 罗勒如果放冰箱里，会变得不新鲜，而且还会走形。

sentences.english: All cfc coolants must be removed from fridges.
sentences.chinese: 必须将所有的氟氯化碳冷却液从冰箱中去除。

sentences.english: Wrap the ball of dough with greaseproof wrapper and chill it for 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把和好的面团用保鲜膜包好，放入冰箱松弛30分钟。

sentences.english: Keep foods away from ranges or refrigerator exhausts.
sentences.chinese: 保持食物远离炉灶或冰箱的排气管。

sentences.english: Batter can be made a day before and stored in refrigerator!
sentences.chinese: 可以提前一天做好面糊，放在冰箱里就行。

sentences.english: I threw it across the kitchen,and it landed in the fridge.
sentences.chinese: 我想把它从厨房的窗户扔到外面，它落进了冰箱里。

sentences.english: I chose the best basket of red bayberries to eat. I put the rest in my refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 我挑了一篮最好的杨梅吃，并把一些放在冰箱里。

sentences.english: Put some orange peels in the refrigerator and they can absorb odd smell.
sentences.chinese: 把橘子皮放进冰箱里可以把异味吸掉。

sentences.english: There's too much for the fridge. I'll put it in the garage. It's cold there.
sentences.chinese: 冰箱里东西太多了，我来把它放到车库里去，那里冷。

sentences.english: He decided to put something under a leg of the fridge so that it would become steady.
sentences.chinese: 他决定把冰箱下面支起条腿，使它变得稳定。

sentences.english: If your refrigerator is too cold, some of the natural fats may harden.
sentences.chinese: 假如冰箱太冷，可能会使瓶内的天然脂肪变硬。

sentences.english: Used as the heater for compressors of refrigerators, freezers and air conditioners.
sentences.chinese: 冰箱，冷柜，空调等制冷压缩机加热。

definition: air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
